products.name: Hair Diffuser for Curly Hair Attachment
products.description: Turn any hairdryer into a diffuser with this attachment

products.name: Curly Girl Microfiber Super Absorbent Anti Frizz Hair Towel
products.description: Help your hair dry faster and reduce frizz with a microfiber towel.

products.name: Curl friendly soft headbands
products.description: These headbands are made by the creator of CurlsBot from soft, stretchy fabric that won't snag or pull on your curls. They're perfect for keeping your hair out of your face and creating lovely styles that won't damage your hair.

products.name: Curly Hair Sleep Cozy
products.description: Protect your hair while you sleep with this cozy turban

products.name: Curly Hair Accessories Kit
products.description: A full kit of Lohy's most useful accessories such as a sleep turban, volume clips, and innovative hydration glove
